item.description:
We've got the gym from 1-3 for the 1st (official) NHC indoor climbing event. Time includes 60-90 minutes of climbing, and the remainder enjoying our own refreshments in the program room (more on this after I get the info packet).

The fee includes admission to the gym, all equipment rental necessary, basic instructions, and trained staff to hold our ropes. Note: because this is a group rate, there is no individual discount for bringing your own equipment (shoes, harnesses, etc.).

THIS EVENT IS FULL.

Please refer to the related message board thread for updates, any questions or discussion, etc.

Your contact for this event is Michelle...I'll email my cell phone # to the yeses the day before the event.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the climbing harness with the hand-painted skulls.
item.name: On Belay!
